title: On stage
creator_credit: Ronald Dick, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Follows a community group in the production of a play from initial casting auditions to the final actual performance. Attempts to give, through its explanatory commentary, an overall view of typical amateur activities and a few hints on common theatrical and organisational problems.
